name: Amelia - The Drought Curse
description:
(Versão BR em Português Aqui!) About

Amelia is a first-person Dark Adventure that takes place in the dry backlands of northeastern Brasil. You can freely explore the open world village, collect items, investigate the curse and fight for survival while being chased and haunted by an evil witch that lives in the Darkness.

This is an Indie production that took seven months to be produced remotely as a partnership between Maloke Games & Makinars Estudio.

Backstory

Veronica is a young adventurous reporter who travels by herself to a small remote village in the backlands of Bahia (Brasil) to write a story about the drought that is decimating the local life.

Upon arriving she notices that the local residents are not receptive and an eerie feeling that someone or something is chasing her starts to take place.

Without a clue of what's really going on there, she starts investigating and soon will find out that the drought goes far beyond a simple natural disaster. The village is upon a terrible curse and she will need much more than a pen and paper to write her story.

Features
  • First-Person (Single Player)
  • Dark Thriller Adventure
  • Customizable Controls
  • Video settings for max Quality or best Performance
  • Save Game at any time during your adventure
  • Available to Linux, Windows & Android
